gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Hawks 123, Celtics 122
gameRecap.excerpt: Atlanta defeats Boston in OT, 123-122. For Atlanta, Dejounte Murray nails the game-winner and led the way with a career-high 44 points, seven rebounds, seven assists, and two steals with Bogdan Bogdanovic tallying 24 points, seven rebounds, and five assists while De’Andre Hunter recorded 21 points and a career-high 13 rebounds in the victory. Jayson Tatum finished with 31 points, 13 rebounds, and six assists while aided by Kristaps Porzingis (20 points, seven rebounds, three blocks), and Derrick White (22 points, seven rebounds, five assists) for Boston in the losing effort. Atlanta improves to 34-39, while Boston moves to 57-16 in the loss.
